FuncDef:
The configuration exclusive timeout command sets the timeout period before the system automatically unlocks the configuration set.
The undo configuration exclusive timeout command restores the default timeout period. The configuration exclusive timeout command sets the timeout period before the system automatically unlocks the configuration set. The undo configuration exclusive timeout command restores the default timeout period. By default, the timeout period is 30 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the timeout period before the system automatically unlocks the configuration set.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 7200, in seconds.
